Clash (on the ground now) was hit in the back multiple times. Clash gasped
loudly. He wasn't expecting there to be so many fighters here, but he wasn't
about to give up. Clahs struggled up to his feet and stumbled around before
regaining his composure...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 13, 2001 6:02 PM
Subject: Battle in Neutral base


> WIndlord/Nightlight::
>
> Nighlight turned her body in air and shot again 25 fireballs against
> Clash, that make that her energy levels was almost empty, last
> Clash's attack hit her and she lost the control and she started to
> fall, she saw before fell in stasis lock somenone and
> screamed "AEROTAURRRRR!!!"
>
> Nightlight fell in stasis lock.
>
> "By all Hawks!!!!!" screamed Windlord, flew quickly and caught her.
> He landed close the base and saw a groups of rocks. Windlord
> deposited her there. Windlord saw other bot in stasis lock, distance
> among RedBolt and Nighlight was around 30 feet;  and he saw other bot
> Shotting at Serge and CLash
>
> "Windlord to Aerotaur" said Windlord used his comm link "Nightlight
> is right... She's hurt and in stasis lock, but she will survive..."
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >     On his way back to the base he picked up the transmission from
> Red Bolt.
> > By the time he gets there Aerotaur sees Freewing taking off and
> heading for
> > their base.  At the base he lands and returns to his bot mode.
> There he sees
> > Nightlight and Perplex fighting with two unknown bots and a third
> unknown bot
> > helping them, sort of.  He looks between them and decides that
> Perplex is
> > fine.  He turns and leaps at Clash drawing his staff and slashing
> at his
> > back.
>
>
>
>
